i18n.title: Filtering Falsy Values in JavaScript Arrays
i18n.description: In this lab, we will delve into the concept of working with arrays in JavaScript. You will learn how to use the Array.prototype.filter() method to remove falsy values from an array. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to manipulate arrays in JavaScript and be able to apply this knowledge to your own projects.

meta.title: Mastering Array Manipulation in JavaScript | Compact Arrays
meta.description: Learn how to use Array.prototype.filter() to remove falsy values and create compact arrays in JavaScript. Improve your programming skills with this hands-on tutorial.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, arrays, array manipulation, compact arrays, Array.prototype.filter

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 在JavaScript数组中过滤虚假值
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将深入探讨在JavaScript中使用数组的概念。你将学习如何使用Array.prototype.filter()方法从数组中移除虚假值。在本实验结束时，你将对如何在JavaScript中操作数组有更深入的理解，并能够将这些知识应用到你自己的项目中。

meta.title: 掌握JavaScript中的数组操作 | 精简数组
meta.description: 学习如何使用Array.prototype.filter()在JavaScript中移除虚假值并创建精简数组。通过这个实践教程提升你的编程技能。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, 数组, 数组操作, 精简数组, Array.prototype.filter

verify.name: 验证Node命令用法
verify.hint: 在终端/SSH中，可以通过输入'node'并按下回车键来运行JavaScript。
